page.title: 08Houses-Bwlch-y-groes area.
page.content: Most of the houses on our block are farmhouses.In Llwyndrain and Star there are some terraced houses.There is only one school built in 1876.There are two public houses,the Fox and Hounds which is in Cwm Cuch and the Falls which is in Star.There are some bungalows in Star and in Llwyndrain.My house is just opposite the school.It is small.We are building an extension.So far we have demolished most of the surroundings.We are living in a caravan at the moment.We are making it bigger because there are eight in our family.We have hired a J.C.B.to knock down the walls and the garage that was attached to our house.Our house is going to have about seven rooms altogether.Most people own their own houses.There are no council houses in our block.
